articles.title: Viewers Guide and Picks (Week 4): Michigan-Nebraska, Illinois-Indiana - 247Sports
articles.description: We look at all of the top games in college football and across the Big Ten in Week 4 of the season
articles.content: * West Virginia at Kansas (-13), 6 p.m. (Fox Sports 1) – Both teams are 2-1 heading into their Big 12 opener. WVU bounced back from its loss to Ohio by defeating rival Pittsburgh 31-24 in overtime. K… [+4200 chars]
